title: Some bugfixes and improvements:
message:
Some bugfixes and improvements:

- Player runs in its own service. Should now be able to run in the background without getting killed
- Wakelocks and WiFi locks so that the CPU and WiFi don't sleep while downloading/playing
    - Might be too excessive on WiFi locks if auto-redownloading is enabled
- Some smaller bugfixes, especially concerning the player
- Enable hardware acceleration per default for UI
